author: Roland "Ak" Gruber
description: This recipe is light on elderflower liqueur to make a relatively dry drink. Those after a sweeter version may prefer to follow the standard 3:2:1 Spritz formula with 45ml prosecco, 30ml elderflower and 12.5ml soda.
name: Hugo

recipeInstructions.text: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly stir
